results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: T(n,m) = Product_{i=0..6} binomial(n+i,m)/binomial(m+i,m).
comment: Triangle of generalized binomial coefficients (n,k)_7; cf. A342889. - _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 03 2021
link: Johann Cigler, Pascal triangle, Hoggatt matrices, and analogous constructions, arXiv:2103.01652 [math.CO], 2021.
program: (PARI) T(n, k) = prod(j=0, 6, binomial(n+j, k)/binomial(k+j, k)); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Apr 01 2021
xref: Triangles of generalized binomial coefficients (n,k)_m (or generalized Pascal triangles) for m = 1,...,12: A007318 (Pascal), A001263, A056939, A056940, A056941, A142465, A142467, A142468, A174109, A342889, A342890, A342891.
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Sep 20 2008
ext: Edited by the Associate Editors of the OEIS, May 17 2009
